data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schulz, Andreas, Heinze, Jürgen, Pusch, Katja (2007): Description of two new Te m n o t h o r a x species (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) from Italy. Zootaxa 1471: 1-14, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176690
